title: Looking for Fonts for Economy Magazine
content:
Hi guys,

I am working on a freelance project for an Economy and Politics Magazine. I dunno if it will finally see the light one day or not. I was searching for fonts that could give functional to read as well as this conservative (as most of this magazines are) but with a touch of modernity and freshness. I dunno if I am clear.

I thought for body text maybe Hoefler Text or Century Style but they are very well know already. For Sans type I thought of Caecilia or Officina Sans.

Not sure yet, what do you think or like? It would be nice to have your oppinions.

Best,  
Sebastiao
